## Pipeline.addPipe() method

Adds one or more pipes to the pipeline.

**Signature:**

```typescript
addPipe<T, R>(pipe: Pipe<T, R> | Pipe<T, R>[]): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  pipe | [Pipe](./pipeline.pipe.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, R&gt; \| [Pipe](./pipeline.pipe.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, R&gt;\[\] | A single pipe or an array of pipes to add to the pipeline. |

**Returns:**

this

The updated pipeline instance.
